thread.title: Stock Review for Wireless Communications Investors -- Globalstar, NII Holdings, Telefonica Brasil, and Vodafone

author: cnbc.com
title: Stock Review for Wireless Communications Investors -- Globalstar, NII Holdings, Telefonica Brasil, and Vodafone

organizations.name: stock review for wireless communications investors

text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 21, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on GSAT, NIHD, VIV, and VOD which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . For today, WallStEquities.com offers reports on Globalstar Inc. (NYSE AMER: GSAT), NII Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: NIHD), Telefonica Brasil S.A. (NYSE: VIV), and Vodafone Group PLC (NASDAQ: VOD). Companies in the Wireless Telecommunications Services industry are engaged in providing wireless communication services, such as paging, cell phone, and other satellite telecommunication services. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
Globalstar
On Tuesday, shares in Covington, Louisiana headquartered Globalstar Inc. recorded a trading volume of 3.52 million shares. The stock ended the day at $0.96, rising slightly by 0.85% from the last trading session. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 17.85%. Furthermore, shares of Globalstar, which provides mobile voice and data communications services through satellite worldwide, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 42.20.
On February 16 th , 2018, Globalstar announced that it will release its fourth-quarter and annual 2017 financial results on February 22 nd , 2018, after the market closes. The Company will conduct a conference call that evening at 5:00 p.m. ET to discuss these results. The call may be accessed under the Investor Relations section of the Company's website. Get the full research report on GSAT for free by clicking below at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=GSAT
NII Holdings
Reston, Virginia-based NII Holdings Inc.'s stock jumped 5.60%, finishing yesterday's session at $0.61 with a total trading volume of 265,042 shares. The Company's shares have surged 67.59% over the previous three months. The stock is trading above its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 21.09% and 13.96%, respectively. Additionally, shares of NII Holdings, which provides wireless communication services under the Nextel brand in Brazil, have an RSI of 56.24.
On February 13 th , 2018, NII Holdings (NIHD) announced that the NASDAQ Hearings Panel granted the Company an extension through June 11 th , 2018, to regain compliance with the minimum bid share price necessary for continued listing on the NASDAQ Global Select Market, which requires NIHD to maintain a closing bid price of at least $1.00 for a minimum of ten consecutive business days. During the extension, the Company's common stock will continue to trade on the NASDAQ. Get access to our top-rated research, including the free report on NIHD at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=NIHD
Telefonica Brasil
Shares in Sao Paulo, Brazil headquartered Telefonica Brasil S.A. ended the session 1.34% lower at $16.23. The stock recorded a trading volume of 1.02 million shares. The Company's shares have gained 4.98% in the last month, 9.22% over the previous three months, and 8.51% over the past year. The stock is trading 3.09% above its 50-day moving average and 7.12% above its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Telefonica Brasil, which provides mobile and fixed line telecommunications services to residential and corporate customers in Brazil, have an RSI of 50.46. Click here to subscribe for a free membership which welcomes you with our report on VIV at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=VIV
Vodafone Group
At the closing bell on Tuesday, Newbury, the UK-based Vodafone Group PLC's stock dropped 1.14%, finishing at $28.65. A total volume of 3.43 million shares was traded. The Company's shares have gained 14.10% over the past year. The stock is trading 3.12% below its 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Vodafone, which provides mobile communications services in EMEA region, Asia/Pacific, and the US, have an RSI of 34.89.
On February 05 th , 2018, research firm Numis upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Add' to 'Buy'. To get free access to your research report on VOD, sign up at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=VOD
--
